{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.01433v1", "title": "Reaction and interaction nucleus-nucleus cross sections in the complete
  Glauber theory", "summary": "The straightforward calculations of the reaction and interaction cross
sections of the nuclear scattering are carried out in Glauber approach using
the generating function method. It allows for the resummation of all orders of
Glauber theory. The results are obtained for $^4$He, $^{11}$Li, $^{12}$C
scattering on $^{12}$C target. The difference between the reaction and the
differential cross section is shown to be not exceeding several percents", "main_category": "nucl-th", "categories": "nucl-th,hep-ph", "published": "2025-04-02T07:34:53Z"}
